Package trivia

Class Summary
Actor Generic class for all objects in the game that both move and paint.
Actors Container for all Actors.
Bullet A single point Actor that does not interact with others.
Button Graphic representing a clickable area for game control.
CollisionThread Calculates the collisions of one actor in relation to the group of actors.
EndGame Displays all post-game information and allows player to return to Main Menu.
FightingActor The base class for an Actor that will participate in combat.
GameEngine Handles all the game logic and painting based on the current game mode.
GameMode Abstract class that contains all of the necessary methods for GameModes.
Instructions Displays the instructions for play and offers a button to go to MainMenu.
MainGame Pulls questions from text files based on which categories are selected.
MainMenu Allows player to select which categories to pull questions from.
Particle Fundamentally the same as a Bullet, but doesn't collide with other actors due to class name.
ParticleEngine Controls the logic behind the creation of differing Particle explosions.
Questions Reads in all questions based on categories selected, then offers a way to retrieve those questions and their right answer.
Sandbox A mode used for testing of new features.
Square Used to represent the enemy.
ToggleButton A button that has two states, on and off.
Triangle Fights for the Player, and is affected by Player performance via a change in evade chance.
Trivia The class that controls and owns all necessary objects.
Window Starts the game and displays the Applet.
